General.Name: DNXcorp
General.Description: DNXCorp SE engages in the development and promotion of internet-based audience in Luxembourg and internationally. The company offers traffic generation, a space purchasing platform; website development and services; integrated payment systems; databases management; optimisation of real time data analysis; and CRM analyses and actions. It operates consumer websites in the entertainment and e-commerce markets. DNXCorp SE was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Luxembourg City, Luxembourg. DNXCorp SE is a subsidiary of Pm Equity S.À R.L.
